archimate:Device.name: Temperature Sensor & Logger (TSL)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Monitoring and recording temperature in vaccine fridges, medication storage areas, lab environments, and cold chain logistics.
Specifications:
• Measurement Range: o -40°C to +85°C (wide range for medical-grade storage) • Accuracy: o ±0.5°C or better • Resolution: o 0.1°C increments • Data Logging Interval: o Configurable (from 1 minute to 1 hour) • Memory Capacity: o Minimum 32,000 readings (rolling memory) • Battery Life: o ≥12 months (replaceable or rechargeable) • Display: o Digital LCD with real-time temperature, alarm, and battery status • Alarms: o Visual and audible alarms for min/max temperature breaches • Connectivity: o USB for manual download; Wi-Fi or Bluetooth for automatic data sync • Compliance: o WHO PQS or CDC guidelines; EN12830 or similar • Mounting: o Magnetic back or wall-mountable bracket • Power: o Battery-powered (internal lithium), external power via micro-USB
